identity.name: BricsCoin Dashboard
identity.archetype: Digital Gold Mine (Jewel & Luxury + Electric Tech)

headings.usage: Main page titles, hero sections, major stats. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

mono.usage: Transaction hashes, block heights, wallet addresses, raw data.

rules: NEVER use gradients for text unless it's a massive hero title.
Use the 'Gold' primary color sparingly for high-value actions (Mining Start, Send Coin).
Backgrounds must be deep black/charcoal, not grey.

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside containers, tight gaps (gap-4) between containers.
layout_strategy.container_style: Sharp edges or minimal rounded-md (4px). 1px border with 10% opacity white.
layout_strategy.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl with bg-black/60 for sticky headers and floating wallet panels.

overrides.Card: Remove default shadow. Add 1px border-white/10. Hover: border-primary/50 transition-colors.
overrides.Button: Sharp edges (rounded-sm). Primary buttons use 'Gold Rush' gradient. Secondary buttons are outline only.
overrides.Input: bg-black border-white/20 focus:border-primary/100 focus:ring-0 rounded-sm font-mono.
overrides.Table: Compact density. Row hover: bg-white/5. Font-mono for all data cells.

custom_components.name: HashStreamBackground
custom_components.description: A background component that renders falling/fading hex characters (Matrix style but gold/grey) at very low opacity (0.05).

custom_components.name: MinerStatusGauge
custom_components.description: A circular or semi-circular gauge showing hashrate intensity using SVG or Recharts.

custom_components.name: BlockFeed
custom_components.description: A live-updating list of recent blocks that animates new items in from the top.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire app to kill digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.borders: The 'Tracing Beam' effect on the active mining card.
visual_enhancers.motion: Use framer-motion for all list entrances. Stagger children by 0.05s.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for standard UI. Use 'react-icons/fa' (FontAwesome) for specific crypto brand icons if needed.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable inside text containers.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install fonts: Unbounded, Manrope, JetBrains Mono.
2. Update tailwind.config.js with the specific color palette provided.
3. Create the 'HashStreamBackground' component first to set the vibe.
4. Build the Dashboard using the Bento Grid layout.
5. Ensure the Mining interface uses the 'mining_farm' image as a subtle background or cover.
6. Use 'sonner' for all notifications (mining started, block found).
